content.html:
• I don‚Äôt want to break the streak of posting weeknotes for the last 80 weeks, but I‚Äôm struggling to fill this week‚Äôs entry with anything other than job-hunting. I won‚Äôt be insulted if you skip this!
  • Most of the last week has seen me busy at my laptop preparing a presentation and then presenting it at a panel interview on Friday. I‚Äôll get feedback soon, but I was happy with the end result and hopefully the effort I invested will have been worth it.
  • I‚Äôm contemplating writing up a retrospective of my interviewing experiences, without including names of course, because I‚Äôve learned quite a bit about the whole process of applying for technology leadership roles. It‚Äôs certainly been tough in the current climate of mass tech redundancies.
  • I‚Äôve also learned about my own interviewing strengths and weaknesses. I was particularly nervous of system design interviews following a bad experience several years ago, but recently I‚Äôve performed pretty well. I‚Äôm now a dab hand at Excalidraw!
  • Arsenal comfortably beat Fulham 3-0 today, and for the first time, H watched the whole match with me on the sofa. He‚Äôs suddenly football-obsessed and decided he wants to be a professional footballer when he grows up. Daddy is now delighted he can download his nerdy footballing knowledge onto a willing recipient.

I won‚Äôt be insulted if you skip this! Most of the last week has seen me busy at my laptop preparing a presentation and then presenting it at a panel interview on Friday. I‚Äôll get feedback soon, but I was happy with the end result and hopefully the effort I invested will have been worth it. I‚Äôm contemplating writing up a retrospective of my interviewing experiences, without including names of course, because I‚Äôve learned quite a bit about the whole process of applying for technology leadership roles. It‚Äôs certainly been tough in the current climate of mass tech redundancies. I‚Äôve also learned about my own interviewing strengths and weaknesses. I was particularly nervous of system design interviews following a bad experience several years ago, but recently I‚Äôve performed pretty well. I‚Äôm now a dab hand at Excalidraw! Arsenal comfortably beat Fulham 3-0 today, and for the first time, H watched the whole match with me on the sofa.
